english: This appears to be a fiscal note for HB796 (Texas Sovereignty Act) that only addresses the financial implications of the bill for state and local government. Without access to the actual bill text and content, I cannot make any meaningful assessment of potential impacts on immigrants, Chinese nationals, or any other groups. A fiscal note simply analyzes budget and cost implications of legislation rather than its substantive policy changes.
chinese: 这是一份关于HB796（德克萨斯主权法案）的财政说明，仅涉及该法案对州和地方政府的财政影响。由于无法获取法案的实际内容和条文，我无法对该法案可能对移民、中国公民或其他群体造成的影响做出任何有意义的评估。财政说明仅分析法案的预算和成本影响，而不涉及实质性的政策变化。
